attributes.action: The UK should test for every case of Covid-19 in line with WHO recommendations.
attributes.background:
WHO said every country should test every case of coronavirus. Boris Johnson has decided to only test patients with severe symptoms who are in hospital.

We call on the UK Government to step in line with other countries and test for all cases of Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
